common.title: <h><m1><nw>Servant to Level</nw></m1> <s>to</s> <m2><nw>Items Required</nw></m2></h><h><m3><nw>Items Required</nw></m3> <s>to</s> <m4><nw>Quest Runs</nw></m4></h>
common.material-calculator-description: Calculates total items required from servants you want to level.
common.farming-solver-description: Calculates the most efficient combination of quest runs from items you want to collect.
common.item-list-description: Drop rates in quests for each item.

farming.集めたいアイテムの数を最低1つ入力してください。: Input at least 1 number of items.
farming.集めたいアイテムの数: The number of items to farm
farming.本当にリセットしますか？: Do you really want to reset the form?
farming.you-can-use-export: You can save form values to bookmarks using "Export".
farming.新しく追加された素材のためドロップ率のデータがない場合などがあります。: There may be no drop data because the item is newly added.
farming.フォームの入力内容を他のデバイスやブラウザとやり取りできます。: You can import/export form inputs from/to other devices or browsers.
farming.export-device-description: Bookmark this page by browsers with bookmarks sync such as Chrome or Safari. After that, open the bookmark in the device you want to import data.
farming.export-browser-description: Copy this page's URL to another browser.

material.表示するアイテムがありません。: There are no items to show.
material.周回数を求める対象: Target items to calculate for farming
